General.Name: Asia Green Energy Public Company Limited
General.Description: Asia Green Energy Public Company Limited engages in the distribution of coal business in Thailand. It offers transportation and management services; water transportation and port services; cargo services; warehousing and storage services; and extraction of coal and water transportation consultant. It is also involved in the fuel and agricultural products distribution business; provision of hire purchase and leasing services; generation and supply of electricity; and provision of secured loans for real estate. The company provides boiler and chartering services, as well as involved in sourcing of steam coal activities. It also engages in export business. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

5.Name: Ms. Ni-Orn  Junjamsang
5.Title: Corp. Sec. & Sr. Director of MD's Office.
